channel.title: Hector F. Jimenez
channel.description: Recent content on Hector F. Jimenez

item.title: Hello World, Migrating from blogger to Hugo
item.description:
Introduction

Hi, My name is HÃ©ctor F. Jimenez I’m a computer systems engineering student based on Colombia and for a long time I have wished for so long to manage by myself my blog, I was thinking in a solution that were minimalist, simple and easy to deploy with the github pages, in the past I used to use blogger and wordpress but this options have a few limitations to customize. I tested different options to generate static websites like jekyll, ghost, torhill and lastly hugo; I was quite impressed about Hugo’s features like syntax highlighting, markdown, Latex, simplicity to create themes, post and other cool things that makes this fast and modern static website engine perfect for me, Hugo uses the excellent go programming and libraries for its template engine.

I’ll be writing in spanish and english my thoughts and experiences around my interest.

item.title: Projects
item.description:
Bugs

h.

  Axfr:utp.edu.co - A Sucessful Dns zone transfer in www.utp.edu.co, coordinated with root@utp.edu.co to mitigated the information leakage vulnerability.
  Reflected Xss:Davivienda - Multiple Reflected Cross-site Scripting (XSS) in production Davivienda's apps.

item.title: Projects
item.description:
Projects

  Racket Games A compilation of 2d video games using DrRacket as programming language(spanish).
  Toolkit Installer A set of scripts to install and update tools for Information Security Practices, the shell scripts were implemented for Debian 8 and Ubuntu 14.04.
  Sysadmin Usefull Resources Best practices for sysadmins

item.title: TravelPics
item.description:
Travel Pictures

One of the most interesting things to me is traveling and discovering new things, because you don't take a picture , you capture a moment.
